name: Enkindle
description: Light a bonfire

name: Estus Flask
description: Acquire an estus flask

name: Ring the Bell (Undead Church)
description: Ring the bell that is found within the Undead Parish

name: Ring the Bell (Quelaag’s Domain)
description: Ring the bell that is found within Quelaag’s Domain.

name: Rite of Kindling
description: Acquire the Rite of Kindling

name: Art of Abysswalking
description: Acquire the Covenant of Artorias

name: Reach Anor Londo
description: Arrive in Anor Londo

name: Lordvessel
description: Acquire the Lordvessel within Anor Londo

name: To Link the Fire
description: Achieve the ‘To Link the Fire’ ending.

name: Dark Lord
description: Achieve the ‘Dark Lord’ ending.

name: Strongest Weapon
description: Reinforce a weapon with a regular path using titanite shards, large titanite shards, titanite chunks, and a titanite slab.

name: Crystal Weapon
description: Reinforce a weapon with a crystal path using titanite chunks and a titanite slab.

name: Lightning Weapon
description: Reinforce a weapon with a lightning path using titanite chunks and a titanite slab.

name: Raw Weapon
description: Reinforce a weapon with a raw path using large titanite shards

name: Magic Weapon
description: Reinforce a weapon with a magic path using green shards, blue chunks, and a blue slab

name: Enchanted Weapon
description: Reinforce a weapon with an enchanted path using blue chunks and a blue slab

name: Divine Weapon
description: Reinforce a weapon with a divine path using green shards, white chunks, and a white slab

name: Occult Weapon
description: Reinforce a weapon with a occult path using white chunks and a white slab

name: Fire Weapon
description: Reinforce a weapon with a fire path using green shards, red chunks, and a red slab

name: Chaos Weapon
description: Reinforce a weapon with a chaos path using red chunks and a red slab

name: Covenant: Way of White
description: Join the Way of White covenant.

name: Covenant: Princess’s Guard
description: Join the Princess’s Guard covenant.

name: Covenant: Blade of the Darkmoon
description: Join the Blade of the Darkmoon covenant.

name: Covenant: Warrior of Sunlight
description: Join the Warrior of Sunlight covenant.

name: Covenant: Forest Hunter
description: Join the Forest Hunter covenant.

name: Covenant: Darkwraith
description: Join the Darkwraith covenant.

name: Covenant: Path of the Dragon
description: Join the Path of the Dragon covenant

name: Covenant: Gravelord Servant
description: Join the Gravelord Servant covenant.

name: Covenant: Chaos Servant
description: Join the Chaos Servant covenant.
